name: Mage: Arena
description:
"Welcome to the Arena, Mage."

Battle hordes of the undead with your mage fire in an ethereal battle arena designed to test your self control.
The more you use your powers the more heat you build up, when the heat hit's a certain level it will damage you.

Works with Keyboard/Mouse and Xbox 360 controller (at least mine, will build with more options later)
Controls are explained in game.
